#summary Flashing a .cab file
#labels Featured

= Flashing a .cab file =

  * Download and install 4.9.4_Mobile_Package_(Multi-Lang).zip
  * Download and install B2CAppSetup.exe
  * Download and extract kp500.rar
  * Start kp500-utils-en.exe
  * Flash boot.img and system.img of an official build (zacpod's 1.6 works, too)
  * Start your phone
  * Enter pin into your phone
  * Disable ADB on your phone
  * Connect phone to pc
  * Enter "J" for "Flash with assistant"
  * Enter "GW620" for "Phone Model"
  * Enter the full path to the .cab file
  * Enter the corresponding version
